p.span: Renames a Context. If the destination scope is not defined, then it will be set to the value of the source scope.
xsRenameContext oldContext [IN oldContainer] [BY oldClass] [SCOPED oldScope] to newContext [IN newContainer] [BY newClass] [SCOPED newScope]
| xsRenameContext AirTime IN MyAirTime SCOPED global to AirTime IN MyAirTime in private
Renames the context called 'AirTime' in container 'MyAirTime' in scope 'global' to a context called 'AirTime' in container 'MyAirTime' in the scope 'private.
oldContext, oldContext, oldClass, oldScope, newContext, newContainer, newClass, newScope
The name of the existing Context.
The name of the container that contains the existing Context.
The name of the class for the existing Context.
The scope (private, app, global) where the existing container is stored.
The new name of the Context.
The name of the container that contains the new Context.
The name of the class for the new Context.
The scope (private, app, global) where the new container is stored.
The context is renamed. See xsCloneContext for details about cloning a context.
